summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Aircabio Pricing Module. All features working correctly: vehicle class cards display, mileage brackets configuration, hourly/daily rates, extra fees, fixed routes with Google Maps integration, and summary panel.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby` for DialogContent - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: Login as Super Admin (admin@aircabio.com / admin123) - PASS
Navigate to Pricing tab in sidebar - PASS
Vehicle class cards display (Sedan, Executive, SUV, MPV, Van, Minibus, Saloon, Estate) - PASS (8 vehicles)
Click on Sedan card to view pricing configuration - PASS
Mileage Brackets section shows 3 configured brackets (0-6mi=£40, 6-20mi=£2.50/mi, 20+mi=£2.00/mi) - PASS
Extra Fees section displays default fees (Additional Pickup £10, Waiting £0.50/min, Airport Pickup £10, Meet & Greet £15, Night Surcharge 20%, Child Seat £10) - PASS
Fixed Routes section shows 'Heathrow to Central London' route with £75 price - PASS
Edit button on Mileage Brackets enables editing with Save/Cancel/Add Bracket buttons - PASS
Add Route button opens map dialog with Google Maps - PASS
Map dialog shows markers A (Heathrow) and B (Central London) with radius circles - PASS
Summary panel shows correct counts (Mileage Brackets: 3, Fixed Routes: 1, Base Fare: £5.00, Min Fare: £25.00) - PASS
Backend API /api/pricing-schemes/sedan returns correct data - PASS
Backend API /api/map-fixed-routes/vehicle/sedan returns Heathrow route - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Google Maps Marker API is deprecated - consider migrating to AdvancedMarkerElement (console warning)
DialogContent missing aria-describedby for accessibility compliance
seed_data_creation: Existing seed data used - Sedan has 3 mileage brackets and 1 fixed route (Heathrow to Central London at £75)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pricing Module is fully functional. All vehicle class cards display correctly. Sedan pricing configuration includes 3 mileage brackets, hourly/daily rates, extra fees, and 1 fixed route. Edit functionality works for all sections. Add Route dialog opens with Google Maps integration showing Heathrow and Central London markers with radius circles. Summary panel displays correct counts.
